about_the_game:
Answer the call of the wild with Sapphire Safari, an open-world Photography Adventure Game! Capture the beauty of real-life Monster Girls in their natural habitats.

The Demo of Sapphire Safari will have players exploring the beginning of the first biome, home to four unique species native to Sapphire Island.

As a wildlife photographer, you're tasked with photographing these creatures as they socialize, hunt, sleep, and mate, all while you maintain your distance from the predator lurking around the island.

Sapphire Island is teeming with unique wildlife, but not all are friendly. Stalk your way through the landscape and try to remain unnoticed, the island’s Predators love a tasty snack.

Become one with the Natives! Spending time around the creatures will cause them to become friendly. Initiate intimate acts, engage in playful activities, and let the Wildlife pose for you!

Complete the Encyclopedia, Witness every Intimate Act, Recover lost Expedition Logs, Uncover the Island, Collect all Achievements, Unleash hidden dangers, and much more! Sapphire Safari offers a bounty of objectives to complete and mysteries to discover!

  • Explore environments, teeming with Monster Girls.
  • A full complement of voice acting by industry professionals.
  • Explore many unique locations and photograph/catalog the wildlife on display.
  • Bond with the Monster Girls in their unique environments, and experience new sensations!
  • Customize your experience with many sexual Flavors on offer! A veritable Furry delight!
  • Complete your Encyclopedia and Discover all the Secrets! A rewarding collect-a-thon.
  • Day or Night. Rain, Storms, or Sunshine! Sapphire Island changes depending on the dynamic weather.
  • Share your Snaps! All photos taken produce shareable images, perfect for showing off your skills.

Answer the call of the wild and experience the incredibly unique adventure of Sapphire Safari!

content_descriptors.notes:
Players are tasked with taking photos of Monster/Animal/Furry Girls engaging in lewd and sexual activities while remaining hidden. 

Monster/Animal/Furry Girls can have Male and Female Genitals set to the Player's preference. 

Monster/Animal/Furry Girls are divided into Predator and Prey classifications, with Predators hunting Prey and Player forcing those captured into Sexual Acts. Flora in the game will react to any creature standing too close, forcing those captured into Sexual Acts.

Players can engage in sexual activities with the Monster/Animal/Furry Girls by completing photo quests and other progression methods throughout the game.

name: Sapphire Safari Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i7-3370 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400F or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Answer the call of the wild with Sapphire Safari, an open-world Photography Adventure Game! Capture the beauty of real-life Monster Girls in their natural habitats, use tools to lure them into more erotic poses, and become intimate with them if you are brave enough...
